name: Orc
pages: Orcs are brutal humanoid creatures who are easily aggrevated and lash out with destructive force. Orcs are known for carrying more primative weapons but will wield a sword if the opportunity arises. They also have a fondness for iron and most likely will be carrying some wherever they wander.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Medium$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Uncommon$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Walks$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Faster$(br)$(l)Health$(): 30+hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 3+hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Overworld, Underworld
$(l)Weapons$():$(br)- Can be armed with Iron Axe, Iron Sword, Club, or Spiked Club.

pages.title: Club
pages.text: A club is equal to a Stone sword but slower.$(br2)*Clubs cannot be crafted.*

pages.title: Spiked Club
pages.text: A spiked club is equal to a Iron sword but slower.$(br2)*Spiked Clubs cannot be crafted.*
